User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

role.description: User's role (Admin, Control Owner, Auditor, Viewer).

activityLog.description: Log of user's activities for auditing purposes.

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: Represents an IT asset within the organization.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Asset entity.

category.description: Category of the asset (e.g., server, application).

ownerId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Asset) Owner of the asset.

classification.description: Classification of the asset (e.g., critical, confidential).

Control.title: Control
Control.description: Represents a security or IT control.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Control entity.

ownerId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N Control) Responsible owner for the control.

ControlImplementation.title: ControlImplementation
ControlImplementation.description: Represents the implementation of a control on a specific asset.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ControlImplementation entity.

controlId.description: Reference to Control. (Relationship: Control 1:N ControlImplementation) The control being implemented.

assetId.description: Reference to Asset. (Relationship: Asset 1:N ControlImplementation) The asset the control is implemented on.

evidenceLink.description: Link to evidence of control implementation.

status.description: Status of control implementation (Not Implemented, In Progress, Implemented, Verified).

lastVerified.description: last date the control was verified.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ComplianceReport entity.

userId.description: Reference to User. (Relationship: User 1:N ComplianceReport) User who generated the report.

Framework.title: Framework
Framework.description: Represents a compliance framework (e.g., ISO 27001, NIST).

id.description: Unique identifier for the Framework entity.

ControlFrameworkMapping.title: ControlFrameworkMapping
ControlFrameworkMapping.description: Represents the mapping between a control and a framework.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ControlFrameworkMapping entity.

controlId.description: Reference to Control. (Relationship: Control 1:N ControlFrameworkMapping) The control being mapped.

frameworkId.description: Reference to Framework. (Relationship: Framework 1:N ControlFrameworkMapping) The framework the control is mapped to.

ControlAssignment.title: ControlAssignment
ControlAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of a control to an asset.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ControlAssignment entity.

controlId.description: Reference to the Control being assigned.

assetId.description: Reference to the Asset the control is assigned to.

assignedBy.description: Reference to the User who assigned the control.

assignedAt.description: Timestamp of when the assignment was made.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user data. Path-based ownership ensures only the user or an admin can access the data.

/users/{userId}/assets/{assetId}.description: Stores assets owned by a specific user. Enforces path-based ownership for security.

/users/{userId}/controls/{controlId}.description: Stores controls owned by a specific user. Enforces path-based ownership for security.

/controlImplementations/{controlImplemen.description: Stores control implementations. Includes denormalized 'ownerId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/complianceReports/{compl.description: Stores compliance reports generated by a user. Path-based ownership ensures only the generating user has access.

/frameworks/{frameworkId}.description: Stores compliance frameworks. Allows global read access but restricts modification to admins.

/controlFrameworkMappings/{controlFramew.description: Stores mappings between controls and frameworks. Allows global read access but restricts modification to admins.

/roles_admin/{userId}.description: Indicates if a user is an admin. Existence of the document grants admin privileges.

/controlAssignments/{assignmentId}.description: Stores control assignments. Allows authorized users to manage assignments.
